import React from "react"; import style from "./person.module.css"; import BadgeIcon from "@mui/icons-material/Badge"; import SchoolIcon from "@mui/icons-material/School"; import ContactInfo from "../contactInfo/ContactInfo"; import SocialMediaLinks from "../socialmedia/Socialmedia"; /** * * * A component that displays the user's personal details and information, receiving the data from the JSON file. */ function Person(props) { return (
0 ? props.mainImage[0].url : "ImageUrl" } alt={ props.mainImage && props.mainImage.length > 0 ? props.mainImage[0].alt : "Description" } className={style.profileImage} />

{props.name}

{props.title}

ת.ז {props.id} | {props.country}

מטרת הדוח: {props.reportPurpose}

מיקוד הבדיקה: {props.focusCheck}

{props.nicknames && props.nicknames.length > 0 ? (

כינויים: {props.nicknames.join(", ")}

) : (

כינויים:

)}

השכלה: {props.education}

); } export default Person;
